column2: Tired, 45-54 Male  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient)
column9: I have been taking this for constipation due to mild pain killer use.  I have been taking this for about 2 years at the recommendation of my Endo. I just had a visit with my GP.  He said the long term use of this could cause serious problem, and for me to switch to Miralax (or it's generic).

column2: Vern1180, 55-64 Male  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: My Doctor has Prescribed Me Senakot "S" after my Cancer Surgery! This was Because of the Pain Medication that was Not Allowing me To Have Bowel Movements! He explained that since it was almost a Week that I should take 8 pills That Evening and 4 More the Next Morning!! I was then able to go!! I now Only take 2 Pills a Day, and Everything is Working Great!!I'll have to be on these for a while due to Chemotherapy and other Medications that I am on!! I wonder why the FDA is Making Senakot Recall this All Natural Product?? Maybe Not enough money in it for them??
